AssessmentSavedSession.name: AssessmentSavedSession
AssessmentSavedSession.description: Represents a session of an assessment that's saved to resume for later.

AssessmentId.description: The assessment record for which the session is saved.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the assessment saved session record.

UsageType.description: Specifies the use case of the saved assessment session.
